Package org.oddjob.script

Scripting Jobs and Types.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Evaluatable
    Something that can be evaluated.
    Invoker
    Something that can invoke something.
    InvokerArguments
    Arguments for passing to an Invoker.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConvertableArguments
    Provide InvokerArguments that will be converted using an ArooaConverter.
    InvokeEitherDF
    The DesignFactorys for InvokeJob and InvokeType.
    InvokeJob  
    InvokeType  
    InvokeType.Conversions
    Conversions.
    MethodInvoker
    An Invoker for a java method.
    MethodInvoker.Conversions  
    NotPreCompiled
    Provide an Evaluatable for a not compile ScriptEngine.
    PreCompiled
    Provide an Evaluatable for a CompiledScript.
    ScriptCompiler
    This class is used to run Compile scripts.
    ScriptInvoker
    An Invoker for a script snippet.
    ScriptInvoker.Conversions  
    ScriptJob  
    ScriptJobDF
    DesignFactory for the ScriptJob.
    ScriptRunner
    This class is used to run scripts
